recipes.title: Idli
recipes.instructions: 1. Rinse idli rice and urad dal separately, soak with fenugreek seeds for 6 hours. 2. Grind urad dal into a fluffy batter and rice into a slightly coarse paste. 3. Combine both batters with salt, ferment overnight or 8–10 hours. 4. Grease idli plates lightly with oil. 5. Stir the batter gently and pour into moulds ¾ full. 6. Steam in an idli cooker or pressure cooker without weight for 10–12 minutes. 7. Insert a toothpick to check doneness—it should come out clean. 8. Rest for 2 minutes before scooping idlis out with a spoon. 9. Serve hot with coconut chutney and sambar. 10. Optionally drizzle ghee or garnish with grated coconut.

recipes.title: Medu Vada
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak urad dal for 4–5 hours. 2. Grind into a thick fluffy batter using minimal water. 3. Mix in chopped ginger, green chili, curry leaves, pepper, and salt. 4. Wet hands, take a portion of batter, shape into a round patty with a hole in the center. 5. Heat oil in a deep kadai until medium hot. 6. Slide vadas gently into oil. 7. Fry on medium flame until golden on both sides. 8. Remove and drain on paper towels. 9. Serve hot with chutney or sambar. 10. Optionally soak in yogurt for thayir vadai.

recipes.title: Sambar
recipes.instructions: 1. Rinse toor dal and pressure cook with turmeric until soft. 2. Mash the cooked dal. 3. Soak tamarind in warm water, extract juice. 4. Heat oil in a pot, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, and red chilies. 5. Add onions, sauté until translucent. 6. Add tomatoes, cook until mushy. 7. Stir in sambar powder and salt. 8. Add drumstick pieces, cook 5 minutes. 9. Pour tamarind extract, bring to boil. 10. Add mashed dal, simmer 10 minutes, garnish with coriander.

recipes.title: Rasam
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak tamarind in warm water and extract juice. 2. In a pot, add tamarind water, chopped tomatoes, turmeric, rasam powder, and salt. 3. Bring to boil until raw smell fades. 4. Stir in cooked dal (optional). 5. Adjust water for desired consistency. 6. Heat ghee in pan, add mustard seeds, urad dal, garlic, and curry leaves. 7. Let splutter and become aromatic. 8. Pour tempering over boiling rasam. 9. Garnish with coriander. 10. Serve hot with rice or drink as soup.

recipes.title: Dosa
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak rice and urad dal separately for 6–8 hours with fenugreek seeds. 2. Grind urad dal to a fluffy batter, rice to coarse paste. 3. Mix, add salt, ferment overnight. 4. Heat dosa tawa, grease lightly. 5. Pour a ladleful batter, spread thin. 6. Drizzle oil along edges. 7. Cook underside until golden. 8. Flip for soft dosa or serve crisp. 9. Remove and serve hot. 10. Pair with chutney, sambar, or masala.

recipes.title: Pongal
recipes.instructions: 1. Dry roast moong dal till aromatic. 2. Wash rice and dal together. 3. Pressure cook with 4 cups water, salt, turmeric until mushy. 4. Heat ghee in a pan, fry cashews till golden. 5. Add ginger, curry leaves, and crushed pepper. 6. Stir fry till aromatic. 7. Pour tempering into rice-dal mixture. 8. Mix well to creamy texture. 9. Add hot water if too thick. 10. Serve hot with coconut chutney.

recipes.title: Upma
recipes.instructions: 1. Dry roast rava till light golden. 2. Heat oil, add mustard seeds, splutter. 3. Add urad dal, curry leaves, ginger, green chilies. 4. Sauté onions till translucent. 5. Add water, salt, boil. 6. Slowly add roasted rava, stir continuously. 7. Cook till water absorbed. 8. Cover and steam 2 minutes. 9. Fluff with fork. 10. Serve hot with chutney or pickle.

recipes.title: Paniyaram
recipes.instructions: 1. Heat oil in pan, add mustard seeds, splutter. 2. Add onions, green chili, curry leaves. 3. Sauté till onions soft. 4. Mix seasoning into batter. 5. Heat paniyaram pan, grease cavities. 6. Pour batter ¾ full. 7. Cook covered on medium till bottoms golden. 8. Flip with skewer. 9. Cook till crisp. 10. Serve with chutney.

recipes.title: Puttu
recipes.instructions: 1. Mix puttu flour with salt. 2. Sprinkle water, rub till moist crumbs form. 3. Test: press flour, it should hold then crumble. 4. Layer flour and grated coconut in puttu maker. 5. Start with coconut, then flour, repeat. 6. Steam for 8–10 minutes. 7. Push out puttu onto plate. 8. Serve with banana and sugar. 9. Pair with kadala curry. 10. Drizzle ghee if desired.

recipes.title: Nei Appam
recipes.instructions: 1. Melt jaggery in a little water to make syrup. 2. Mix jaggery syrup with rice flour, grated coconut, and cardamom to form a thick batter. 3. Heat ghee in an appam pan, pour small portions of batter, and fry until golden brown on both sides. 4. Remove and drain excess ghee; serve warm.

recipes.title: Adai
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak toor dal, chana dal, and rice for 3–4 hours. 2. Grind the soaked mixture coarsely with red chilies, ginger, and a pinch of salt. 3. Heat a tawa, pour a ladle of batter, and spread like a thick pancake. 4. Drizzle oil around edges and cook until golden on both sides. 5. Serve hot with chutney or jaggery.

recipes.title: Kootu
ingredients: vegetables (snake gourd, beans, cabbage, or carrot)
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook moong dal and chopped vegetables until soft. 2. Grind coconut, cumin, and green chilies into a smooth paste. 3. Add the paste to the cooked vegetables and dal, simmer for 5–10 minutes. 4. Heat a little oil, add mustard seeds and curry leaves, pour as tempering. 5. Mix well and serve with rice.

recipes.title: Poriyal
recipes.instructions: 1. Chop vegetables finely. 2. Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds and urad dal; sauté until golden. 3. Add green chilies and curry leaves. 4. Add vegetables and salt, cook covered until tender. 5. Mix in grated coconut, stir well, and serve.

recipes.title: Brinjal Kuzhambu
recipes.instructions: 1. Chop brinjals and soak tamarind in water. 2. Heat oil, add mustard seeds and fenugreek seeds. 3. Add brinjals, curry leaves, chili powder, turmeric, and salt. 4. Pour tamarind juice, simmer until brinjals are soft and curry thickens. 5. Serve hot with rice.

recipes.title: Chettinad Chicken
recipes.instructions: 1. Clean and cut chicken into pieces. 2. Heat oil, sauté fennel seeds, onions, and curry leaves. 3. Add ginger-garlic paste and tomatoes, cook until soft. 4. Add chicken, spices, and salt; cook covered until chicken is tender. 5. Serve hot with rice or roti.

recipes.title: Chicken 65
recipes.instructions: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, red chili powder, cornflour, and salt for 30 minutes. 2. Heat oil in a pan. 3. Deep fry marinated chicken until golden and crispy. 4. Fry curry leaves and green chilies in oil; add to chicken. 5. Serve hot as a snack or starter.

recipes.title: Fish Curry
recipes.instructions: 1. Clean fish and cut into pieces. 2. Soak tamarind in water and extract juice. 3. Heat oil, sauté mustard seeds, fenugreek seeds, onions, ginger, and garlic. 4. Add tomatoes, tamarind juice, chili powder, turmeric, and salt; bring to a boil. 5. Add fish pieces and simmer until cooked. Serve with rice.

recipes.title: Varuval
recipes.instructions: 1. Marinate meat with chili powder, turmeric, ginger, garlic, and salt. 2. Heat oil in a pan and fry the marinated meat until cooked and dry. 3. Add curry leaves and sauté briefly. 4. Serve hot as a side dish or with rice.

recipes.title: Kara Kuzhambu
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak tamarind in water and extract juice. 2. Cook vegetables until tender. 3. Heat oil, add mustard seeds, fenugreek seeds, and curry leaves. 4. Add tamarind juice, chili powder, and salt; simmer for 10 minutes. 5. Pour tempering over curry and serve with rice.

recipes.title: Mor Kuzhambu
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak tamarind in water and extract juice. 2. Whisk yogurt with water until smooth. 3. Mix yogurt with tamarind juice, cumin, fenugreek, green chilies, and salt; cook gently without boiling. 4. Temper with curry leaves in hot oil and pour over the curry. 5. Serve with steamed rice.

recipes.title: Vatha Kuzhambu
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak tamarind in water and extract pulp. 2. Heat oil, add mustard seeds, fenugreek seeds, and curry leaves. 3. Add vathal (dried berries) and sauté briefly. 4. Add tamarind juice, red chili powder, and salt; simmer until thickened. 5. Serve hot with steamed rice.

recipes.title: Ellu(sesame) Sadam
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook rice and let it cool slightly. 2. Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds, urad dal, green chilies, and curry leaves; sauté until aromatic. 3. Add roasted sesame seeds and salt. 4. Mix this tempering into the cooked rice evenly. 5. Serve warm as a main dish.

recipes.title: Lemon Rice
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook rice and allow it to cool. 2. Heat oil, add mustard seeds, urad dal, green chilies, and curry leaves; sauté until aromatic. 3. Pour this tempering over rice. 4. Add lemon juice and salt; mix gently. 5. Serve immediately as a snack or side dish.

recipes.title: Tamarind Rice
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook rice and keep aside. 2. Soak tamarind in water and extract pulp. 3. Heat oil, add mustard seeds, urad dal, curry leaves, green chilies, and turmeric. 4. Add tamarind pulp and salt; cook until it thickens. 5. Mix this tamarind mixture with rice and serve.

recipes.title: Coconut Rice
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook rice and keep aside. 2. Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds, green chilies, curry leaves, and grated ginger; sauté briefly. 3. Add grated coconut and roast lightly. 4. Mix the coconut mixture with rice evenly. 5. Serve warm.

recipes.title: Curd Rice
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook rice and allow it to cool slightly. 2. Mix yogurt with rice until smooth. 3. Heat oil, add mustard seeds, urad dal, curry leaves, green chilies, and grated ginger; sauté briefly. 4. Pour tempering over the rice-yogurt mixture. 5. Serve chilled or at room temperature.

recipes.title: Pazha Payasam
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook rice in milk until soft. 2. Mash ripe banana and add to the milk-rice mixture. 3. Add jaggery and cardamom powder; simmer until slightly thick. 4. Fry cashews and raisins in ghee; add to payasam. 5. Serve warm.

recipes.title: Rava Kesari
recipes.instructions: 1. Roast semolina(rava) lightly in ghee. 2. Boil water with sugar and cardamom powder. 3. Pour syrup into roasted semolina gradually, stirring continuously. 4. Add fried cashews and raisins. 5. Serve warm as a snack or dessert.

recipes.title: Oothappam
recipes.instructions: 1. Prepare thick batter from soaked rice and urad dal. 2. Heat a tawa or skillet and pour a ladle of batter. 3. Spread batter slightly thick, top with chopped onions, tomato, green chilies, curry leaves, and grated coconut. 4. Drizzle oil around edges and cook until golden brown on both sides. 5. Serve hot with chutney or sambar.

recipes.title: Aval Upma
recipes.instructions: 1. Roast flattened rice lightly(aval). 2. Heat oil, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, chopped onions, green chilies, and ginger; sauté until aromatic. 3. Add tamarind pulp and cook briefly. 4. Mix in roasted flattened rice and salt; cook for 2-3 minutes. 5. Serve warm.

recipes.title: Sweet Pongal
recipes.instructions: 1. Roast moong dal and rice lightly. 2. Cook rice and dal together until soft. 3. Melt jaggery and mix with cooked dal-rice mixture. 4. Add cardamom powder, ghee, fried cashews, and raisins. 5. Serve warm as a dessert or snack.

recipes.title: Pazham Pori
recipes.instructions: 1. Slice ripe bananas. 2. Prepare batter with all-purpose flour(maida), rice flour, turmeric, and salt. 3. Dip banana slices in batter and deep fry until golden brown. 4. Drain excess oil. 5. Sprinkle sugar optionally and serve warm.

recipes.title: Mysore Pak
recipes.instructions: 1. Heat ghee in a pan. 2. Mix sugar and water to form a syrup. 3. Add gram flour gradually to the syrup, stirring continuously. 4. Keep adding ghee slowly and cook until mixture leaves the sides of the pan. 5. Pour into greased tray, cut into pieces when set, and serve.

recipes.title: Paruppu Payasam
recipes.instructions: 1. Rinse moong dal and cook it in milk on medium heat until soft. 2. Add jaggery and cardamom powder; stir well and simmer until the mixture slightly thickens. 3. In a separate pan, fry cashews and raisins in ghee until golden. 4. Add the fried cashews and raisins to the payasam, mix well, and serve warm.

recipes.title: Ambur Biryani
recipes.instructions: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, and biryani masala for 1–2 hours. 2. Fry sliced onions until golden brown. 3. Cook rice until 70% done. 4. Layer chicken, rice, fried onions, mint, and coriander in a pot; cover and cook on low heat (dum) for 20–25 minutes. 5. Serve hot with raita.

recipes.title: Dindigul Biryani
recipes.instructions: 1. Marinate meat with ginger-garlic paste, biryani masala, and salt. 2. Fry onions until golden, set aside. 3. Cook rice until partially done. 4. Heat oil, sauté curry leaves and green chilies; add tamarind pulp and coconut paste. 5. Layer meat, rice, and fried onions; cook on low heat (dum) until meat is tender. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Kothu Parotta
recipes.instructions: 1. Shred parotta into small pieces. 2. Heat oil, sauté onions, tomatoes, green chilies, and curry leaves. 3. Add chicken or mutton; cook until done. 4. Add shredded parotta and beaten eggs; stir-fry quickly until eggs cook. 5. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Parotta
recipes.instructions: 1. Knead flour, water, and salt into a smooth dough. 2. Divide into small balls and roll each thinly. 3. Fold and roll again to create layers. 4. Cook on a hot tawa with oil until golden brown on both sides. 5. Serve with curry or chutney.

recipes.title: Keerai Masiyal
recipes.instructions: 1. Wash and chop greens. 2. Boil with turmeric and salt until soft. 3. Mash the greens into a coarse paste. 4. Heat oil, sauté curry leaves and green chilies; mix into mashed greens. 5. Serve as a side dish with rice.

recipes.title: Kola Urundai
recipes.instructions: 1. Mix minced meat with spices and salt; form small balls. 2. Heat oil, fry onion, curry leaves, and ginger-garlic paste. 3. Add meatballs and cook until browned. 4. Add coconut paste, simmer until meatballs are fully cooked. 5. Serve hot with rice or roti.

recipes.title: Kambu Pongal
recipes.instructions: 1. Roast kambu and moong dal lightly. 2. Cook with water, turmeric, and salt until soft. 3. Heat ghee, sauté curry leaves, ginger, and green chilies; mix into pongal. 4. Serve hot as a main dish.

recipes.title: Kambu Dosai
recipes.instructions: 1. Mix kambu flour, rice flour, water, and salt to form a smooth batter. 2. Heat a tawa and pour a ladle of batter; spread thin. 3. Drizzle oil around edges; cook until crisp and golden. 4. Flip and cook other side. 5. Serve with chutney or sambar.

recipes.title: Kambu Upma
recipes.instructions: 1. Heat oil, sauté chopped onions, green chilies, and curry leaves. 2. Boil water with salt. 3. Gradually add kambu flour to boiling water, stirring continuously to avoid lumps. 4. Cook until water is absorbed and upma is soft. 5. Serve hot with chutney or pickle.

recipes.title: Kambu Kichadi
recipes.instructions: 1. Roast kambu flour lightly. 2. Boil water with turmeric and salt. 3. Add moong dal and cook until soft. 4. Gradually add kambu flour while stirring to avoid lumps. 5. Heat oil, sauté curry leaves, and pour over kichadi. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Kambu Millet Idli
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak urad dal for 4–5 hours and grind to a smooth batter. 2. Mix kambu flour, urad dal batter, and salt; let ferment for 8 hours. 3. Grease idli molds and pour batter. 4. Steam for 10–12 minutes until cooked. 5. Serve hot with coconut chutney or sambar.

recipes.title: Kambu Adai
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak toor dal for 2–3 hours and grind coarsely. 2. Mix kambu flour, dal, turmeric, curry leaves, and salt with water to form a thick batter. 3. Heat a tawa and pour batter to form thick pancakes. 4. Drizzle oil and cook on both sides until golden. 5. Serve with chutney or sambar.

recipes.title: Thengai Sadam
recipes.instructions: 1. Heat oil, add mustard seeds, urad dal, curry leaves, and turmeric; sauté briefly. 2. Add grated coconut and roast lightly. 3. Mix in cooked rice and salt; stir until well combined. 4. Serve hot as a main dish.

recipes.title: Puliogare
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak tamarind in water and extract juice. 2. Heat oil, add garlic, curry leaves, green chilies, and ginger; sauté. 3. Add tamarind juice, salt, and tempering spices; simmer for 5–7 minutes. 4. Mix in cooked rice thoroughly. 5. Serve with papad or as is.

recipes.title: Kadalai Curry
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak chickpeas overnight and boil until soft. 2. Heat oil, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, onions, and green chilies; sauté. 3. Add tomatoes, turmeric, chili powder, and salt; cook until soft. 4. Add boiled chickpeas; simmer for 10 minutes. 5. Serve hot with rice or roti.

recipes.title: Sundal
ingredients: boiled legumes (chickpeas, black-eyed peas, or toor dal)
recipes.instructions: 1. Heat oil, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, and green chilies; sauté. 2. Add boiled legumes and salt; mix well. 3. Stir in grated coconut; cook for 2–3 minutes. 4. Serve as a snack or side dish.

recipes.title: Pachadi
recipes.instructions: 1. Chop vegetables and mix with yogurt and tamarind paste. 2. Heat oil, add mustard seeds and curry leaves; pour over yogurt mixture. 3. Add chopped green chilies and salt; stir well. 4. Serve chilled as a side dish with rice.

recipes.title: Thayir Vadai
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak urad dal for 4–5 hours, grind into a smooth batter. 2. Shape small vadas and deep fry until golden. 3. Whisk yogurt with salt and turmeric; add grated coconut, chopped green chilies, and curry leaves. 4. Soak fried vadas in yogurt mixture for 10–15 minutes. 5. Serve chilled.

recipes.title: Athirasam
recipes.instructions: 1. Melt jaggery in water to make syrup. 2. Mix rice flour and cardamom powder into syrup to form a dough. 3. Shape into small discs. 4. Heat ghee and deep fry discs until golden brown. 5. Cool slightly and serve as a sweet snack.

recipes.title: Murukku
recipes.instructions: 1. Mix rice flour, urad dal flour, salt, cumin seeds, and melted butter; knead into a smooth dough with water. 2. Fill dough in a murukku press. 3. Heat oil and press spirals into hot oil. 4. Fry until golden brown and crisp. 5. Drain on paper and serve as a snack.

recipes.title: Ribbon Pakoda
recipes.instructions: 1. Mix urad dal powder, rice flour, chili powder, salt, and butter into a soft dough. 2. Heat oil in a pan. 3. Shape the dough using a ribbon pakoda mold directly into hot oil. 4. Fry until crisp and golden. 5. Drain and serve as a snack.

recipes.title: Masala Puri
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook toor dal until soft and mash. 2. Heat oil, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, and garlic. 3. Sauté onions and tomatoes until soft. 4. Mix dal, turmeric, chili powder, and salt; simmer for 5 minutes. 5. Serve over puffed puris as a snack.

recipes.title: Vendakkai Curry
recipes.instructions: 1. Wash and cut okra. 2. Heat oil, sauté mustard seeds, curry leaves, and garlic. 3. Add ginger, tomato, turmeric, and chili powder; cook until tomatoes soften. 4. Add toor dal and okra, simmer until cooked. 5. Serve hot with rice.

recipes.title: Snake Gourd Kootu
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook urad dal and toor dal until soft. 2. Chop snake gourd and onions. 3. Heat oil, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, and sauté onions. 4. Add snake gourd, turmeric, tamarind juice, and cooked dal; simmer. 5. Grind coconut into a paste and mix in. Serve with rice.

recipes.title: Cabbage Poriyal
recipes.instructions: 1. Finely chop cabbage, onion, garlic, and ginger. 2. Heat oil in a pan, sauté mustard seeds, garlic, ginger, and onion. 3. Add cabbage, turmeric, chili, and salt; cook covered until tender. 4. Mix in grated coconut and stir well. Serve as a side dish.

recipes.title: Peerkangai Curry
recipes.instructions: 1. Chop ridge gourd and onions. 2. Cook toor dal and urad dal until soft. 3. Heat oil, sauté mustard seeds, onions, and ginger. 4. Add ridge gourd, turmeric, chili, and salt; cook until tender. 5. Add cooked dal, simmer, and serve hot with rice.

recipes.title: Nethili Fry
recipes.instructions: 1. Clean and wash anchovies. 2. Marinate with turmeric and salt. 3. Lightly coat with rice flour. 4. Heat oil in a pan and shallow fry until golden and crisp. 5. Serve hot as a side or snack.

recipes.title: Nandu Roast
recipes.instructions: 1. Clean and cut the crab into pieces. 2. Heat oil, sauté mustard seeds, turmeric, and chili powder. 3. Add crab pieces, cover and cook until done. 4. Grind coconut with spices into a paste and add to the crab. 5. Simmer until gravy thickens and serve hot.

recipes.title: Chettinad Mutton
recipes.instructions: 1. Marinate mutton with turmeric, chili powder, and salt. 2. Heat oil, sauté onions, garlic, and curry leaves. 3. Add marinated mutton and cook until tender. 4. Grind coconut into a paste and add to the curry. 5. Simmer until thickened and serve with rice.

recipes.title: Mutton Chukka
recipes.instructions: 1. Marinate mutton with chili powder, garlic, and salt. 2. Heat oil and sauté curry leaves. 3. Add mutton and fry on high heat until dry and cooked. 4. Serve as a spicy side dish with rice or roti.

recipes.title: Mutton Sukka
recipes.instructions: 1. Marinate mutton with chili powder, garlic, turmeric, and salt. 2. Heat oil in a pan and fry mutton on medium heat until dry and cooked. 3. Stir continuously for even cooking. 4. Serve hot as a dry curry with rice or roti.

recipes.title: Kozhi Biryani
recipes.instructions: 1. Marinate chicken with chili powder, salt, and ginger-garlic paste. 2. Heat oil, sauté mustard seeds, curry leaves, and onions. 3. Add chicken and cook until half done. 4. Add soaked rice, tamarind juice, and water; cook covered until rice and chicken are fully done. 5. Serve hot with raita or boiled eggs.

recipes.title: Egg Curry
recipes.instructions: 1. Boil and peel eggs. 2. Heat oil, sauté onions, ginger, garlic, and curry leaves. 3. Add tomatoes, turmeric, and chili powder; cook until soft. 4. Add coconut paste and water to make a gravy. 5. Add boiled eggs, simmer for 5–10 minutes, and serve hot with rice or roti.

recipes.title: Chettinad Prawn Masala
recipes.instructions: 1. Clean prawns and marinate with turmeric and salt. 2. Heat oil, sauté mustard seeds, curry leaves, onions, and garlic. 3. Add chili powder and coconut paste, cook for 2–3 minutes. 4. Add prawns and simmer until cooked. 5. Serve hot with steamed rice.

recipes.title: Prawn Kuzhambu
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak tamarind in water and extract juice. 2. Heat oil, sauté onions and curry leaves. 3. Add tomatoes, turmeric, chili powder, and tamarind juice; simmer for 5–10 minutes. 4. Add cleaned prawns and cook until done. 5. Serve hot with steamed rice.

recipes.title: Karuveppilai Rasam
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook toor dal and mash. 2. Soak tamarind and extract juice. 3. Heat oil, sauté garlic and curry leaves. 4. Add tomatoes, turmeric, and tamarind juice; boil for 5 minutes. 5. Add mashed dal, simmer, and serve hot with rice.

recipes.title: Pazhaiya Vadai
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak urad dal and rice, then grind into a coarse batter. 2. Add chopped ginger, green chilies, curry leaves, and salt. 3. Heat oil in a pan. 4. Shape batter into small vadai and deep fry until golden. 5. Serve hot as a snack.

recipes.title: Kara Pongal
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook toor dal and rice together until soft. 2. Heat oil, sauté mustard seeds, urad dal, curry leaves, ginger, and green chilies. 3. Add chopped tomato, turmeric, and salt; cook briefly. 4. Mix in cooked dal and rice, adjust consistency with water. 5. Serve hot as a savory dish.

recipes.title: Kal Dosa
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak rice and urad dal, grind into a smooth batter. 2. Heat a griddle, add oil and spread batter thinly. 3. Sprinkle chopped coconut, tomato, curry leaves, and mustard seeds on top. 4. Cook until crisp and golden. 5. Serve hot with chutney or sambar.

recipes.title: Rava Dosa
recipes.instructions: 1. Mix rava, rice flour, urad dal flour, salt, and water into a thin batter. 2. Heat a griddle and drizzle oil. 3. Pour batter in a circular motion to make thin dosa. 4. Sprinkle chopped ginger, tomato, curry leaves, and mustard seeds. 5. Cook until crisp and serve with chutney or sambar.

recipes.title: Paniyaram Sweet
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak and grind rice into a smooth batter. 2. Prepare jaggery syrup and mix with rice batter. 3. Add coconut and cardamom powder. 4. Heat paniyaram pan, drizzle ghee, pour batter in molds, and cook until golden. 5. Serve warm.

recipes.title: Paniyaram Spicy
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak and grind urad dal and rice into a batter. 2. Mix chopped onion, mustard seeds, chili, curry leaves, and salt into batter. 3. Heat paniyaram pan with oil. 4. Pour batter into molds, cook until crisp on both sides. 5. Serve hot with chutney.

recipes.title: Aloo Masala
recipes.instructions: 1. Boil and mash potatoes. 2. Heat oil, sauté urad dal, curry leaves, onion, garlic, and ginger. 3. Add tomato and chili, cook until soft. 4. Add mashed potatoes and mix well. 5. Serve hot with dosa, idli, or chapati.

recipes.title: Keerai Bhaji
recipes.instructions: 1. Wash and chop spinach. 2. Heat oil, sauté toor dal, urad dal, and curry leaves. 3. Add tomato and spinach, cook until wilted. 4. Mix in grated coconut and salt. 5. Serve hot as a side or snack.

recipes.title: Keerai Masala
recipes.instructions: 1. Chop spinach and onions. 2. Heat oil, sauté mustard seeds, curry leaves, onion, and ginger. 3. Add turmeric, chili, and salt. 4. Add spinach, cover, and cook until wilted. 5. Serve hot with rice or roti.

recipes.title: Vendhaya Kuzhambu
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook toor dal until soft. 2. Grind coconut with chili to a smooth paste. 3. Heat oil, sauté fenugreek seeds and curry leaves. 4. Add tomatoes and turmeric; cook for 2–3 minutes. 5. Mix dal and coconut paste, simmer 5–7 minutes. 6. Serve hot with steamed rice.

recipes.title: Kollu Sundal
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak and boil horse gram until tender. 2. Heat oil, sauté garlic and curry leaves. 3. Add boiled horse gram, tamarind juice, and salt. 4. Cook for 5 minutes and serve warm as a snack.

recipes.title: Kelvaragu Pongal
recipes.instructions: 1. Roast and grind finger millet. 2. Cook toor dal and mix with millet. 3. Heat oil, sauté ginger, onion, green chilies, and curry leaves. 4. Mix with millet and dal, cook 5–7 minutes. 5. Serve hot as a nutritious main dish.

recipes.title: Thengai Paal
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook rice until soft. 2. Prepare coconut milk. 3. Heat oil, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, and ginger. 4. Add cooked rice and tamarind, pour coconut milk. 5. Simmer for 5 minutes and serve hot.

recipes.title: Elaneer Payasam
recipes.instructions: 1. Mix rice flour in water to make a thin paste. 2. Boil coconut water with jaggery. 3. Add rice paste and cook until thickened. 4. Add tender coconut pulp and cardamom powder. 5. Drizzle ghee and serve chilled or warm.

recipes.title: Filter Coffee
recipes.instructions: 1. Boil water and add coffee powder in a filter. 2. Brew the coffee decoction. 3. Boil milk and add sugar. 4. Mix decoction with hot milk. 5. Serve hot in traditional cups.

recipes.title: Kozhi Varuval
recipes.instructions: 1. Marinate chicken with chili powder, garlic, and salt. 2. Heat oil, sauté mustard seeds and curry leaves. 3. Add chicken, cook until golden and fully cooked. 4. Serve hot with rice or chapati.

recipes.title: Keema Varuval
recipes.instructions: 1. Heat oil, sauté onions, ginger, chili, and curry leaves. 2. Add minced mutton and salt; cook until browned. 3. Add tamarind paste and simmer 10–15 minutes. 4. Serve hot as a snack or side.

recipes.title: Mutton Chops Chettinad
recipes.instructions: 1. Marinate mutton chops with chili powder, ginger, and salt. 2. Heat oil, sauté mustard seeds and curry leaves. 3. Add mutton chops and cook until tender and browned. 4. Serve hot with rice or roti.

recipes.title: Surul Pattai Curry
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook toor dal until soft. 2. Heat oil, sauté ginger, curry leaves, and chili. 3. Add tomato and salt; cook until soft. 4. Add drumstick leaves and dal, simmer 5–10 minutes. 5. Serve hot with rice.

recipes.title: Pathiri
recipes.instructions: 1. Mix rice flour with water and salt to form a smooth dough. 2. Roll out thin discs. 3. Heat a pan and cook discs until light brown on both sides. 4. Serve hot with coconut chutney or curry.

recipes.title: Thengai Paal Payasam
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook rice in water until soft. 2. Add coconut milk and sugar, simmer gently. 3. Add cardamom powder and roasted nuts. 4. Drizzle ghee before serving warm.

recipes.title: Banana Halwa
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook toor dal and mash bananas. 2. Heat ghee, add dal and banana mixture. 3. Add sugar and cardamom, cook until halwa thickens. 4. Serve warm.

recipes.title: Pazham Kanji
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook toor dal until soft. 2. Mash bananas and add to cooked dal. 3. Add grated coconut, ginger, chili, and salt. 4. Cook for 5 minutes and serve warm as a nutritious snack.

recipes.title: Kozhukattai Sweet
recipes.instructions: 1. Steam rice flour with water to make dough. 2. Prepare sweet filling with grated coconut and jaggery, add ginger and cardamom. 3. Shape dough into small cups, fill with sweet mixture. 4. Steam again 5–7 minutes. 5. Serve warm.

recipes.title: Pori Urundai
recipes.instructions: 1. Roast puffed rice lightly. 2. Heat oil, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, and ginger. 3. Add roasted rice and coconut, sauté 2–3 minutes. 4. Serve warm as a snack or light meal.

recipes.title: Paalkova
recipes.instructions: 1. Boil milk until thickened. 2. Mix in sugar and cook until it forms a soft fudge. 3. Add roasted coconut and dal paste. 4. Serve in small pieces once cooled.

recipes.title: Neyyappam
recipes.instructions: 1. Mix rice flour with water to form batter. 2. Melt jaggery in water and combine with batter. 3. Add coconut, cardamom, and fried urad dal. 4. Fry spoonfuls in ghee until golden. Serve warm.

recipes.title: Paruppu Usili
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook dal and mash into a coarse paste. 2. Steam the dal paste, crumble it. 3. Heat oil, sauté onions and turmeric. 4. Add crumbled dal and tamarind; cook 5–7 minutes. 5. Serve hot with rice.

recipes.title: Kal Dosa Special
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak urad dal and grind into a smooth batter. 2. Mix with rice flour, turmeric, and salt. 3. Heat a flat pan and pour a ladle of batter, spread thin. 4. Drizzle oil and cook until crisp. Serve hot with chutney.

recipes.title: Chettinad Pepper Chicken
recipes.instructions: 1. Marinate chicken with salt and crushed black pepper. 2. Heat oil, sauté curry leaves. 3. Add chicken and cook until browned. 4. Grind coconut and add to curry, simmer 10 minutes. Serve hot with rice.

recipes.title: Pazhai Kozhukattai
recipes.instructions: 1. Prepare rice flour dough with salt and turmeric. 2. Mash ripe bananas and mix with grated coconut. 3. Shape dough into cups, fill with banana mixture. 4. Steam 5–7 minutes. Serve warm with ghee.

recipes.title: Sundakkai Vathal Kuzhambu
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak tamarind and extract juice. 2. Heat oil, sauté ginger, onion, and curry leaves. 3. Add sundakkai and tamarind juice, cook 10 minutes. 4. Add urad dal paste and simmer 5 minutes. Serve with steamed rice.

recipes.title: Madurai Jigarthanda
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak basil seeds in water until soft. 2. Prepare sarsaparilla syrup. 3. Layer chilled milk, syrup, ice cream, and basil seeds in a glass. 4. Serve immediately with a straw.

recipes.title: Kara Kuzhambu Eggplant
recipes.instructions: 1. Chop eggplant and tomato. 2. Heat oil, sauté ginger, chili, and curry leaves. 3. Add eggplant and tomato, cook 5–7 minutes. 4. Add tamarind juice, simmer until cooked. Serve with rice.

recipes.title: Vellai Paniyaram
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak urad dal and rice, grind into a smooth batter. 2. Add turmeric, chili, and salt. 3. Pour batter into paniyaram pan, cook both sides with a little oil. 4. Serve hot with chutney.

recipes.title: Kollu Rasam
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook kollu until soft and mash. 2. Boil tomatoes with turmeric and chili. 3. Heat oil, sauté garlic and curry leaves. 4. Combine all, add coconut paste, simmer 5 minutes. Serve hot with rice.

recipes.title: Kollu Sundal
recipes.instructions: 1. Boil kollu until soft. 2. Heat oil, sauté ginger, onion, and curry leaves. 3. Add boiled kollu, mix well. 4. Garnish with grated coconut. Serve as a snack or side dish.

recipes.title: Mannargudi Thalapakatti Biryani
recipes.instructions: 1. Marinate chicken with spices, ginger, and garlic. 2. Fry onions until golden. 3. Cook rice partially. 4. Layer rice and chicken, steam until fully cooked. 5. Serve hot with raita.

recipes.title: Kozhi Milagu Roast
recipes.instructions: 1. Marinate chicken with turmeric, black pepper, and salt. 2. Heat oil, sauté curry leaves. 3. Roast chicken until golden and cooked through. 4. Garnish with fried coconut. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Masala Dosa
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak rice and urad dal, grind to a smooth batter. 2. Prepare potato masala with onion, garlic, turmeric, and chili. 3. Pour batter on hot pan, spread thin. 4. Place potato masala inside dosa, fold, and serve with chutney.

recipes.title: Set Dosa
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak rice and urad dal, grind to batter. 2. Add salt and a small amount of tamarind juice. 3. Pour batter into set dosa molds, cook with a little oil. 4. Serve hot with chutney or sambar.

recipes.title: Thattu Dosa
recipes.instructions: 1. Grind soaked rice and urad dal into batter. 2. Mix ginger paste and grated coconut. 3. Pour batter on hot pan, spread thin. 4. Drizzle oil, cook until crisp. Serve with chutney.

recipes.title: Rava Idli
recipes.instructions: 1. Roast rava lightly. 2. Prepare a tempering with mustard seeds, ginger, garlic, and curry leaves. 3. Mix roasted rava with water and tempering. 4. Pour into idli molds and steam 10–12 minutes. Serve with chutney or sambar.

recipes.title: Idiyappam
recipes.instructions: 1. Mix rice flour with hot water and salt to form dough. 2. Press dough through idiyappam maker into thin strings. 3. Steam 5–7 minutes. 4. Serve with coconut milk or vegetable stew.

recipes.title: Vazhaipoo Vadai
recipes.instructions: 1. Chop banana flower finely, soak in water with salt. 2. Grind urad dal with garlic and turmeric. 3. Mix banana flower with dal paste, form vadai. 4. Deep fry until golden. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Satham Paruppu
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook toor dal and urad dal until soft. 2. Heat oil, sauté onion, garlic, chili, and curry leaves. 3. Mix in cooked dal and rice, garnish with grated coconut. 4. Serve hot as a main dish.

recipes.title: Kuzhi Paniyaram
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak urad dal and rice, grind to smooth batter. 2. Add turmeric, garlic, chili, and salt. 3. Pour batter into paniyaram pan, cook both sides with oil. 4. Serve hot with chutney.

recipes.title: Pani Puri
recipes.instructions: 1. Make small puris from semolina and wheat flour. 2. Prepare spicy tamarind water. 3. Boil potatoes and mash with spices. 4. Fill puris with potato-chickpea mixture and serve with tamarind water.

recipes.title: Bread Omelette
recipes.instructions: 1. Beat eggs with chopped onion, tomato, chili, salt, and pepper. 2. Pour mixture into a hot pan, cook until almost set. 3. Place a slice of bread on top and fold. 4. Cook both sides and serve hot.

recipes.title: Vegetable Pasta
recipes.instructions: 1. Boil pasta until al dente. 2. Sauté onion, garlic, and bell peppers in olive oil. 3. Add tomato sauce and simmer. 4. Mix pasta with sauce, garnish with basil and cheese.

recipes.title: Spring Rolls
recipes.instructions: 1. Finely chop vegetables and sauté with soy sauce. 2. Fill wrappers with vegetable mixture. 3. Roll tightly and seal edges. 4. Deep fry until golden brown and serve hot.

recipes.title: Chocolate Cake
recipes.instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C. 2. Mix dry ingredients and wet ingredients separately. 3. Combine both mixtures and pour into a greased baking pan. 4. Bake for 30–35 minutes, cool, and serve.

recipes.title: Vegetable Puff
recipes.instructions: 1. Boil and mash potatoes, mix with sautéed peas, carrot, onion, and spices. 2. Cut puff pastry sheets and fill with vegetable mixture. 3. Fold and seal edges. 4. Bake at 200°C until golden and crispy.

recipes.title: Aloo Paratha
recipes.instructions: 1. Boil and mash potatoes, mix with chili, coriander, and salt. 2. Roll wheat dough into small circles. 3. Place potato filling inside and fold. 4. Cook on a hot tawa with butter and serve hot.

recipes.title: Momos
recipes.instructions: 1. Prepare dough from flour and water. 2. Finely chop vegetables and mix with soy sauce. 3. Fill dough with vegetable mixture and fold. 4. Steam for 10–15 minutes and serve with chili sauce.

recipes.title: Cheese Sandwich
recipes.instructions: 1. Butter the bread slices. 2. Place cheese, tomato, and lettuce between slices. 3. Grill on a pan until golden brown and cheese melts. 4. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Chicken Roll
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook chicken with spices. 2. Spread cooked chicken on roti. 3. Add chopped onion and tomato. 4. Roll tightly and serve hot.

recipes.title: Pizza
recipes.instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 220°C. 2. Roll pizza dough and spread tomato sauce. 3. Add toppings and cheese. 4. Bake for 15–20 minutes until crust is golden.

recipes.title: Cupcake
recipes.instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C. 2. Beat butter and sugar until fluffy. 3. Add eggs, flour, milk, and baking powder. 4. Pour into cupcake molds and bake for 20–25 minutes.

recipes.title: French Fries
recipes.instructions: 1. Peel and cut potatoes into strips. 2. Soak in water for 30 minutes. 3. Deep fry until golden brown. 4. Season with salt and serve hot.

recipes.title: Pasta Salad
recipes.instructions: 1. Boil pasta until al dente and cool. 2. Chop vegetables. 3. Mix pasta, vegetables, and mayonnaise. 4. Season with salt and pepper and serve chilled.

recipes.title: Gulab Jamun
recipes.instructions: 1. Mix khoya, flour, and milk to make dough. 2. Shape into small balls. 3. Deep fry until golden. 4. Soak in sugar syrup with rose water and serve.

recipes.title: Samosa
recipes.instructions: 1. Make dough with flour, oil, and water. 2. Boil potatoes and mix with peas and spices. 3. Roll dough, fill with mixture, and fold. 4. Deep fry until golden brown.

recipes.title: Paneer Tikka
recipes.instructions: 1. Marinate paneer cubes in yogurt and spices for 1–2 hours. 2. Skewer and grill or bake until edges are charred. 3. Serve hot with chutney.

recipes.title: Veg Burger
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook vegetable patty until golden. 2. Toast burger buns. 3. Assemble with lettuce, tomato, patty, cheese, and sauces. 4. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Pav Bhaji
recipes.instructions: 1. Boil and mash vegetables. 2. Sauté onion, tomato, and spices in butter. 3. Mix vegetables and simmer. 4. Serve with buttered pav buns.

recipes.title: Vada Pav
recipes.instructions: 1. Boil and mash potatoes with spices. 2. Make batter from gram flour. 3. Coat potato mixture with batter and deep fry. 4. Serve in bread buns with chutney.

recipes.title: Poha
recipes.instructions: 1. Rinse flattened rice and set aside. 2. Sauté onion, chili, mustard seeds, turmeric, and peanuts. 3. Add rice and cook briefly. 4. Garnish with coriander and serve.

recipes.title: Upma
recipes.instructions: 1. Roast semolina lightly. 2. Sauté onion, chili, ginger, curry leaves, and mustard seeds. 3. Add water and bring to boil. 4. Stir in semolina and cook until fluffy. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Masala Dhokla
recipes.instructions: 1. Mix gram flour, yogurt, turmeric, chili, and ginger to form batter. 2. Steam until fluffy. 3. Prepare tempering with mustard seeds and curry leaves. 4. Pour over dhokla and serve.

recipes.title: Rasgulla
recipes.instructions: 1. Prepare chenna by curdling milk. 2. Roll into small balls. 3. Boil in sugar syrup with cardamom until spongy. 4. Cool and serve chilled.

recipes.title: Brownie
recipes.instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C. 2. Mix dry ingredients. 3. Add wet ingredients and combine. 4. Bake for 25–30 minutes. Cool and serve.

recipes.title: Waffles
recipes.instructions: 1. Preheat waffle iron. 2. Mix all ingredients into batter. 3. Pour into waffle iron and cook until golden brown. 4. Serve with syrup or fruits.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.instructions: 1. Mix all ingredients into smooth batter. 2. Pour small portions on hot pan. 3. Cook until bubbles form and flip. 4. Serve with syrup or honey.

recipes.title: Fried Rice
recipes.instructions: 1. Boil rice and cool. 2. Sauté garlic and vegetables. 3. Add rice and soy sauce, stir-fry until combined. 4. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Hakka Noodles
recipes.instructions: 1. Boil noodles until soft and drain. 2. Sauté garlic and vegetables. 3. Add noodles and soy sauce, stir-fry well. 4. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Mutton Curry
recipes.instructions: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger, and spices. 2. Add mutton and brown. 3. Add tomato and water, simmer until mutton is tender. 4. Serve hot with rice or roti.

recipes.title: Chole Bhature
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook chickpeas with spices to make chole. 2. Prepare dough with flour, yeast, and milk, roll into balls, and deep fry to make bhature. 3. Serve together hot.

recipes.title: Dhokla
recipes.instructions: 1. Mix gram flour, yogurt, turmeric, chili, and ginger to form batter. 2. Steam until fluffy. 3. Prepare tempering with mustard seeds and curry leaves. 4. Pour over dhokla and serve.

recipes.title: Falafel
recipes.instructions: 1. Soak chickpeas overnight. 2. Grind with onion, garlic, parsley, cumin, and coriander. 3. Shape into balls and deep fry. 4. Serve with hummus or pita.

recipes.title: Ice Cream
recipes.instructions: 1. Mix milk, cream, sugar, and flavoring. 2. Freeze while stirring occasionally until set. 3. Serve chilled.

recipes.title: Sandwich Cake
recipes.instructions: 1. Spread cream and fruits between bread slices. 2. Layer slices to form cake. 3. Decorate with cream and fruits. 4. Chill and serve.

recipes.title: Corn Puffs
recipes.instructions: 1. Prepare dough from cornmeal, salt, and spices. 2. Fry or bake until puffy. 3. Serve as a crunchy snack.

recipes.title: Bhajiya / Pakora
recipes.instructions: 1. Slice vegetables thinly. 2. Coat with gram flour, salt, and spices. 3. Deep fry until golden brown. 4. Serve hot with chutney.

recipes.title: White Sauce Pasta
recipes.instructions: 1. Boil pasta until al dente. 2. In a pan, melt butter, add flour and cook to form roux. 3. Gradually add milk, stirring continuously to form a smooth white sauce. 4. Add cheese, salt, and pepper. 5. Mix cooked pasta and sautéed vegetables with the sauce. 6. Serve hot, garnished with extra cheese or herbs.

recipes.title: Kachori
recipes.instructions: 1. Prepare dough with flour and salt. 2. Cook spiced urad dal filling. 3. Fill dough with dal mixture, seal, and deep fry until golden. 4. Serve hot with chutney.

recipes.title: Cheese Pizza
recipes.instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 220°C. 2. Roll dough and spread tomato sauce. 3. Add cheese and oregano. 4. Bake for 15–20 minutes and serve hot.

recipes.title: Chicken Shawarma
recipes.instructions: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices. 2. Grill or pan-fry until cooked. 3. Slice and wrap in pita with lettuce and tomato. 4. Serve with sauce.

recipes.title: Veg Sandwich
recipes.instructions: 1. Butter bread slices. 2. Layer vegetables and cheese. 3. Close sandwich and cut into pieces. 4. Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Cheesecake
recipes.instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C. 2. Mix crushed graham crackers with butter for base. 3. Beat cream cheese, sugar, eggs, and vanilla. 4. Pour over base and bake for 45 minutes. Cool and chill before serving.

recipes.title: Roti / Chapati
recipes.instructions: 1. Mix flour, water, and salt to form dough. 2. Divide dough and roll into thin circles. 3. Cook on hot tawa until golden spots appear. 4. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Methi Thepla
recipes.instructions: 1. Mix flour, methi leaves, spices, and water to form dough. 2. Roll into thin circles. 3. Cook on tawa with oil until golden. 4. Serve hot with yogurt.

recipes.title: Pasta Alfredo
recipes.instructions: 1. Boil pasta until al dente. 2. Heat butter and sauté garlic. 3. Add cream and cheese to make sauce. 4. Mix pasta and serve hot.

recipes.title: Mushroom Soup
recipes.instructions: 1. Sauté mushrooms, onion, and garlic in butter. 2. Add water or stock and cook. 3. Blend to smooth. 4. Add cream, season, and serve hot.

recipes.title: Chicken Nuggets
recipes.instructions: 1. Cut chicken into small pieces. 2. Coat with flour, dip in egg, and roll in breadcrumbs. 3. Deep fry until golden brown. 4. Serve with sauce.

recipes.title: Veg Manchurian
recipes.instructions: 1. Make small vegetable balls using cabbage, carrot, and cornflour. 2. Deep fry until golden. 3. Prepare sauce with soy sauce, garlic, and chili sauce. 4. Toss fried balls in sauce and serve.

recipes.title: Roti Wrap
recipes.instructions: 1. Place vegetables and cheese on roti. 2. Drizzle sauce. 3. Roll tightly and serve immediately.

recipes.title: Prawn Fry
recipes.instructions: 1. Clean prawns and marinate with spices. 2. Sauté onion and garlic. 3. Add prawns and fry until cooked. 4. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Chocolate Brownie Cake
recipes.instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C. 2. Mix dry ingredients. 3. Add eggs and melted butter. 4. Pour into baking tray and bake for 25–30 minutes. Cool before serving.

recipes.title: Roti Pizza
recipes.instructions: 1. Spread tomato sauce on roti. 2. Add vegetables and cheese. 3. Bake or cook on tawa until cheese melts. 4. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Chocolate Muffins
recipes.instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C. 2. Mix dry and wet ingredients separately. 3. Combine and pour into muffin molds. 4. Bake for 20–25 minutes.

recipes.title: Cheese Balls
recipes.instructions: 1. Boil and mash potatoes. 2. Mix with cheese, salt, and pepper. 3. Shape into balls and coat with breadcrumbs. 4. Deep fry until golden brown.

recipes.title: Corn Salad
recipes.instructions: 1. Boil corn and cool. 2. Chop vegetables. 3. Mix all ingredients with lemon juice, salt, and pepper. 4. Serve chilled.

recipes.title: Veg Pulao
recipes.instructions: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, and vegetables in oil. 2. Add rice and spices, stir well. 3. Add water and cook until rice is done. 4. Serve hot.
